CustomActivity.name: ADCreateGroupAdvanced
CustomActivity.label: ADCreateGroupAdvanced
CustomActivity.description: An activity that creates groups in AD.
CustomActivity.settings: {"data":{"name":"AD Create Group Advanced","description":"Active Directory Create a Group","Timeout":"00:01:00","class":[],"rootSettings":{"isCollapse":false,"activitySettings":[{"value":"","required":true,"key":"Path","disabled":false,"styleClass":"","label":"Path","labelKey":"AD_CREATE_GROUP_ADV_PATH","baseType":"control","controlType":"textbox","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"","required":true,"key":"GroupDescription","disabled":false,"styleClass":"","label":"Description","labelKey":"AD_CREATE_GROUP_ADV_GROUP_DESCRIPTION","baseType":"control","controlType":"textbox","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"","required":true,"key":"Notes","disabled":false,"styleClass":"xl-textarea","label":"Notes","labelKey":"AD_CREATE_GROUP_ADV_NOTES","baseType":"control","controlType":"textarea","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"Global","required":true,"key":"Scope","disabled":false,"label":"Scope","styleClass":"","labelKey":"AD_LIST_ADV_OU_SCOPE","baseType":"control","controlType":"autocomplete","controlOptions":[{"key":"Global","value":"Global"},{"key":"Universal","value":"Universal"}]},{"value":"Security","required":true,"key":"AdType","disabled":false,"label":"Type","styleClass":"","labelKey":"AD_LIST_ADV_OU_TYPE","baseType":"control","controlType":"autocomplete","controlOptions":[{"key":"Security","value":"Security"},{"key":"Distribution","value":"Distribution"}]},{"value":"","required":true,"key":"ADGroupName","disabled":false,"label":"Group Name","styleClass":"","labelKey":"AD_CREATE_GROUP_ADV_GROUP_NAME","baseType":"control","controlType":"textbox","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"","required":true,"key":"EmailAddress","disabled":false,"label":"Email Address","styleClass":"","labelKey":"AD_CREATE_GROUP_ADV_EMAIL_ADDRESS","baseType":"control","controlType":"textbox","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"","required":true,"key":"ManagedByDN","disabled":false,"label":"Owner Dist. Name","styleClass":"","labelKey":"AD_CREATE_GROUP_ADV_MANAGED_BY","baseType":"control","controlType":"textbox","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"","required":false,"key":2,"disabled":false,"label":"new control11","styleClass":"","labelKey":"","baseType":"hostGroup","controlType":"","controlOptions":[]},{"value":"389","required":true,"key":"SecurePort","disabled":false,"label":"Port","styleClass":"","labelKey":"AD_LIST_ADV_OU_SECUREPORT","baseType":"control","controlType":"autocomplete","controlOptions":[{"key":"389","value":"389"},{"key":"636 (Secure)","value":"636"}]}],"index":"1","label":"main","labelKey":null},"size":""}}
CustomActivity.helpHtml:
To create a group, you must provide the fields below:

Path - AD group path

Description - group description

Notes - group info

Managed By - the group is managed by

Scope - Global or Universal group

Type - Security or Distribution group

Group Name - group name

Hostname - AD host

Username - AD username

Password - password for the username

Port - AD port
